about_the_game:
Lord O' Pirates is a difficult yet casual bullet heaven roguelite that blurs the line between a Survivor-like and a traditional action roguelite! Those who find Survivor-likes too dull, but bullet hell's slightly too chaotic, will find Lord O' Pirates to be a refreshing balance between the two! Engage in naval combat from the helm of one of many unlockable and upgradable pirate ships against hordes of military ships, sea monsters, supernatural entities whose spoken names would drive you mad, and should you be so unfortunate as to stumble through the Bermuda Triangle, maybe even [R̴̦̥̟̈͘͝Ȩ̷̖̼͔̬̈̋̉̑͘Ḑ̴̜͎̘́̓̓̕A̸̲̦͑̉́̅͝C̴̠̩̯̼̈́̉̉̅ͅT̶͍̭̋͑E̷̟͂̋Ḏ̴͉̬̟̰̋́͐͌].

  • Buy a bounty of playable ships!

  • Hire a myriad of dastardly captains!

  • Explore new frontiers well beyond the sea!

  • Hunt legendary bosses and bathe in their cursed treasures!

  • Unlock new ships, captains, upgrades by completing quests!

  • Hunt for the most mythical loots to unlock cursed powers!

  • Amass your own pirate fleet with the Lord O' Pirates ability!

We have begun issuing closed beta keys! Spots are limited! Sign up above and join our discord to increase your chances of getting a key!

Note: No villages were pillaged in the making of this video game.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: x64 bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: x64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
